modName: One Book to Rule Them All
modShortDescription: This mod adds two books into the game. These books reads all books and schematics in the game without having to read each book/schematic individually.
modDescription:
One book to rule them, one book to find them, one book to bring them all and in the darkness bind them.

This mod adds two books into the game. TheOneBook reads all [books](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/7-days-to-die-books/) in the game without having to read each book individually. TheOneBookSchematics Reads all schematics that are in the game without having to read each book individually.

## Changelog

Corrected an error which stopped the latest books to be read.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/stallionsden/stallionsmodlets/tree/main/Stallionsdens%20One%20Book%20To%20Rule%20Them%20All)**
